text: Public Policy Polling (PPP) is a U.S. polling firm based in Raleigh, North Carolina."Public Policy Polling Homepage", Public Policy Polling, 2012. Retrieved on 6 December 2012. PPP was founded in 2001 by businessman Dean Debnam, the firm's current president and chief executive officer."About Us" , Public Policy Polling, 2012. Retrieved on 6 December 2012. ==References== Category:2001 establishments in the United States
title: Public Policy Polling
